revised_title: Determination of Specific Inductive Capacities of Dielectrics
tldr: The author presents a new method for determining the specific inductive capacity of dielectrics and tests various liquids and materials, including colza oil, olive oil, arachide, sesame, raw linseed oil, castor oil, ether, bisulfide of carbon, and amylene. The results are compared to previous findings and demonstrate the effectiveness of the new method.
